taxonomyYaml.excerpt: A collection of art created on iPad with the iOS app Paper by WeTransfer. Tutorials and other learnings related to my Mastering Paper series are also included.
taxonomyYaml.html: A collection of art created on iPad with the iOS app Paper by WeTransfer. Tutorials and other learnings related to my Mastering Paper series are also included.

node.excerpt:
Up until recently I would painstakingly erase and Blend away lines until I got them just right when drawing with Paper by FiftyThree.

When version 2.2 was released this past December, along with it came a Color Picker and a way to swap page colors whenever you wanted. Using these new features and a carefully mixed color, I’m going to show you how a “faux” layer can help with sketching…

frontmatter.title: Mastering Paper for iOS: faux layer technique
frontmatter.excerpt: Discover the faux layer technique and how it can aid in sketching and tracing with Paper for iOS.
